#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
    char str[10];
    int arr[4],i,j,k,ctr=15,ans=0;
    for(i=0;i<=3;i++)
    {
                     scanf("%s",str);
                     if(strcmp(str,"black")==0)
                     {
                                               k=0;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=0;
                                               arr[2]=0;
                                               arr[3]=0;
                     }
                     else if(strcmp(str,"brown")==0)
                     {
                                               k=1;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=0;
                                               arr[2]=0;
                                               arr[3]=1;
                     }
                     else if(strcmp(str,"red")==0)
                     {
                                               k=2;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=0;
                                               arr[2]=1;
                                               arr[3]=0;
                     }
                     
                     else if(strcmp(str,"orange")==0)
                     {
                                               k=3;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=0;
                                               arr[2]=1;
                                               arr[3]=1;
                     }
                     
                     else if(strcmp(str,"yellow")==0)
                     {
                                               k=4;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=1;
                                               arr[2]=0;
                                               arr[3]=0;
                     }
                     
                     else if(strcmp(str,"green")==0)
                     {
                                               k=5;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=1;
                                               arr[2]=0;
                                               arr[3]=1;
                     }
                     
                     else if(strcmp(str,"blue")==0)
                     {
                                               k=6;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=1;
                                               arr[2]=1;
                                               arr[3]=0;
                     }
                     
                     else if(strcmp(str,"violet")==0)
                     {
                                               k=7;
                                               arr[0]=0;
                                               arr[1]=1;
                                               arr[2]=1;
                                               arr[3]=1;
                     }
                     else if(strcmp(str,"grey")==0)
                     {
                                               k=8;
                                               arr[0]=1;
                                               arr[1]=0;
                                               arr[2]=0;
                                               arr[3]=0;
                     }
                     
                     else
                     {
                                               k=9;
                                               arr[0]=1;
                                               arr[1]=0;
                                               arr[2]=0;
                                               arr[3]=1;
                     }
                     for(j=0;j<=3;j++,ctr--)
                     {
                                      if(arr[j]==1)
                                      ans+=(1<<ctr);
            
                     }
                     
}
    printf("%d",ans);
    while(k)
    {
     printf("0");
     k--;
    }
    printf(" Guntur");
    return 0;
}
